Instruction: 'Place parsnip chunks and garlic cloves in a large pot and cover with water.'
Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat to medium and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until parsnips are very tender.'
'Return the parsnips and garlic to the pot.'
'Mash the parsnips and garlic with a potato masher.'
Stir in fresh thyme leaves, butter, milk, salt and black pepper until well combined.'
'Continue to mash until desired consistency is reached.'
